meanings: public position or attitude (as opposed to private thoughts)
ceremony for the erection of the framework of a house

lessons.japanese: アメリカも本音と建前を使い分ける国だ。
lessons.english: America is also a country that separates its public motives from its private ones.

lessons.japanese: アメリカも本音と建前を使い分ける国だ。
lessons.english: America is also a country that separates its public face from its private one.

lessons.japanese: アメリカも本音と建前を使い分ける国だ。
lessons.english: America is also a country that separates what one says and does in public from what one says and does behind closed doors.

lessons.japanese: アメリカも本音と建前を使い分ける国だ。
lessons.english: America is also a country that separates public actions and statements from private ones.

lessons.english: America is also a country that separates its public motives from its private ones.

lessons.english: America is also a country that separates its public face from its private one.

lessons.english: America is also a country that separates what one says and does in public from what one says and does behind closed doors.
